challenge.name: Loading...
challenge.description:
#Bahhhh..
 No one told me I had to 'load' the container `185-echo-flag` before I could run it. Can you help me out? Provide the `md5 hash` of the output.

challenge.name: Running Joke
challenge.description: I can't get this container `185-echo-flag` to run. Can you help me out?

hints.content: I think `docker run` is the command you're looking for.

challenge.name: Saving for Later
challenge.description: There is a container named `cyberchef` on a friend's machine (defender@10.0.0.254 pass 1down2down), but he want give it to me.. :( Can you me steal it? Pretty please? Provide the `md5 hash` of the container.

challenge.name: Secret Inspection
challenge.description: There's a secret hidden in the container `185-echo-flag`... Can you 'inspect' it?

challenge.name: Stop It Meg!
challenge.description: For some reason the flag only displays when the container `185-stop-it-meg`is stopped. Do what you must.

challenge.name: i'M iN tHe CoNtAiNeR
challenge.description: Using the `185-in-the-container` container, can you find the flag?

hints.content: You might need to `exec` into the container. Get a shell!

challenge.name: Access Denied
challenge.description: Using the `185-let-me-in` container, can you find the flag?

hints.content: Have you checked the file's permissions?

challenge.name: The Flash
challenge.description: I can't get the `/flag.txt` in the `185-you-thought` container!!!! You're my only hope.

hints.content: Did you know you can run commands in a container without 'exec'ing into it?

challenge.name: Star Wars
challenge.description: I need to get the flag from the `185-star-wars` container, but I can't find it. It is on a different planet. The website is star wars themed...

hints.content: Something something something dark side... try using `-p` to map the port for a basic http server.

challenge.name: 远程命令执行漏洞
challenge.description: This container isn't doing anything... Can you try probing port `12345` for information? It is `185-always-listening`.

hints.content: Use `-p` to map the port to your localhost. Then idk netcat is pretty cool.

challenge.name: Cyber Environment
challenge.description: My container `185-set-variable` only displays the flag if the environment variable `FLAG_VAR` is set to be `flag`.
